features: Upper: Breathable air mesh with no-sew TPU film overlays. Gore across midfoot to comfortably secure foot in place. Full grain leather in medial and lateral side. Reflective webbing detail on heel pull tab and center instep. Synthetic lining
Footbed: Molded PU-like EVA with pigskin topcover
Midsole: A unique modular design that feels comfortably light underfoot. EVA midsole with TPU heel logo
Outsole: Molded rubber outsole with oversized signature Sorel scallops
